DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: state_matrix
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: State matrix (nsite x nyear) of observations. 0 = non visited site or missing data; 1 = species not detected (i.e., either dry or wet site); 2 = species detected (i.e., necessarily a wet site).
